about_me: I'm a computer programmer who loves learning new things and sharing them with others. On this blog, I'll share my knowledge and experiences with you.
a1_description: Learn about the latest features in Next.js 15 and how to migrate your existing applications to take advantage of new improvements.
a2_description: Discover best practices for creating robust and scalable REST APIs using Node.js and Express framework.
a3_description: Deep dive into TypeScript generics and learn how to write more reusable and type-safe code.
a4_title: CSS Grid vs Flexbox: When to Use What
a4_description: A comprehensive guide to understanding the differences between CSS Grid and Flexbox and when to use each layout system.
a5_description: Learn practical techniques to improve your React application's performance and user experience.
a6_description: Explore modern authentication patterns including JWT, OAuth, and session-based authentication.
a7_description: Step-by-step tutorial on creating a real-time chat application using WebSockets and React.
a8_description: Get started with Docker and learn how to containerize your applications for better deployment.
a9_description: Learn the basics of GraphQL and how it compares to traditional REST APIs.
